name: EstimatedGlomerularFiltrationRateEGFRBldSerPlas
title: Estimated Glomerular Filtration Rate (eGFR), Bld/Ser/Plas
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains terms related to estimated glomerular filtration rate (eGFR) using the CKD-EPI 2012 creatinine-cystatin C equation and the CKD-EPI 2009 creatinine equation in blood, serum, or plasma.),(Data Element Scope: ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes estimated glomerular filtration rate (eGFR).),(Exclusion Criteria: )
